title: Precision Academy LF more members
body:
Precision Academy is a newly made team and is looking for more members. Must have Curse for Voice Communication. Must not be a toxic player and you must be able to take constructive criticism and be a team player. Currently we are looking for A top lane, Jungler and a Support. DO NOT ADD ME, Fill out this application and i'll add you.  Tryouts will be held Anytime Today.

Role:
Champion Pool:
Why you want to join this team:
What can you bring to this team:
Voice Comms: 
Times Available During the Week: 
Current Rank:

Current Roster:
TOP: 
JUNGLE: 
MID: Vaternix XX 
ADC: Hi I'm Geno
SUPPORT: ZattoBlood

replies.body:
Role: Support
Champion Pool: Leo, Lulu, Braum, Janna, Sona, Soraka, Thresh,  Blitz, Nami
Why you want to join this team: I want to join that team that I can grow in and that gives me constructive criticism. 
What can you bring to this team: Lots of game knowledge. A good attitude and non toxic enviorment
Voice Comms: Curse TS Discord Skype
Times Available During the Week: Any time except from 1-3pm central. 
Current Rank: Gold4

Role: Jungle
Champion Pool: Elise reksai gragas quinn shaco nidalee lee sin (i can play pretty much anything well)
Why you want to join this team: Id like to join this team because i dont want a team that just gives up after a loss.
What can you bring to this team: I can bring leadership experience(played on 2 diamond teams as a supp) and constructive criticism.
Voice Comms: Yea
Times Available During the Week: Anything after 6 pm est
Current Rank: G4

Role: Support 
Champion Pool: Braum, Annie, soraka, janna, and karma 
Why you want to join this team: I just enjoy playing on ranked teams with other 
What can you bring to this team: a lot of game knowledge I have been plat since season 3 and have been playing since season 1. 
Voice Comms: Any system including curse 
Times Available During the Week: any night 
Current Rank: Plat V

Role: Support
Champion Pool: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=zattoblood dont feel like listing because I play what team needs.
Why you want to join this team: I am looking for a team that will make it somewhere and not disband when something bad happens.
What can you bring to this team: I have tournament experience so I know what it takes to be on a team.
Voice Comms: Yes
Times Available During the Week: Open right now
Current Rank: S2 because I gave up playing for a bit because friends and drinking rofl

Role: Top
Champion Pool: GP, Illaoi, Yasuo, and Jax
Why you want to join this team: Get better.
What can you bring to this team: Solid top laner with experience. 
Voice Comms: I got pretty much all programs I know of.
Times Available During the Week: All days preferably evening-night

Role: Support
Champion Pool: Blitz, Thresh, Alistar, Leona, Braum.
Why: cause i want to
What can i bring to the team: hooks
Voice comms: nothing
Times available during the week: I work from 4;30-9:30pm eastern i can play before and after
